00001 /*                                                                                                                                                      
00002  * This is a user-space application that reads /dev/sample                                                                                              
00003  * and prints the read characters to stdout                                                                                                             
00004  */
00005 
00006 #include <stdio.h>
00007 #include <string.h>
00008 #include <errno.h>
00009 #include <unistd.h>
00010 #include <sys/types.h>
00011 #include <sys/stat.h>
00012 #include <fcntl.h>
00013 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00014 {
00015   char * app_name = argv[0];
00016   char * dev_name = "/dev/hello2";
00017   int ret = -1;
00018   int fd = -1;
00019   int c, x;
00020   char *cmd = argv[1];
00021   size_t len = 0;
00022 
00023 
00024   if(argc!=3){
00025     fprintf(stderr, "./app rd length\n");
00026     fprintf(stderr, "./app wr data\n");
00027     goto Done;
00028   }
00029   /*                                                                                                                                                    
00030    * Open the sample device RD | WR                                                                                                                     
00031    */
00032   if ((fd = open(dev_name, O_RDWR)) < 0) {
00033     fprintf(stderr, "%s: unable to open %s: %s\n" ,
00034             app_name, dev_name, strerror(errno));
00035     goto Done;
00036   }
00037 
00038   if(strcmp(cmd,"wr")==0){
00039     c = atoi(argv[2]);
00040     //while (1) {                                                                                                                                       
00041     if ((x = write(fd, &c, sizeof(c))) < 0) {
00042       fprintf(stderr, "%s: unable to write %s: %s\n",
00043           app_name, dev_name, strerror(errno));
00044       goto Done;
00045     }
00046     //if (! x) break;                                                                                                                                 
00047     //}                                                                                                                                               
00048   }
00049 
00050   /*                                                                                                                                                    
00051    * Read the sample device byte-by-byte                                                                                                                
00052    */
00053   if(strcmp(cmd,"rd")==0){
00054     len = atoi(argv[2]);
00055     //while (1) {                                                                                                                                       
00056     if ((x = read(fd, &c, len)) < 0) {
00057       fprintf(stderr, "%s: unable to read %s: %s\n",
00058               app_name, dev_name, strerror(errno));
00059       goto Done;
00060     }
00061     //      if (! x) break;                                                                                                                           
00062 
00063     /*                                                                                                                                                
00064      * Print the read character to stdout                                                                                                             
00065      */
00066     fprintf(stdout, "%d\n", c);
00067     //    }                                                                                                                                           
00068   }
00069 
00070 
00071   /*                                                                                                                                                    
00072    * If we are here, we have been successful                                                                                                            
00073    */
00074   ret = 0;
00075 
00076  Done:
00077   if (fd >= 0) {
00078     close(fd);
00079   }
00080   return ret;
00081 }
